intent_template: Can you add {{item}} to my cart and take me to the final checkout screen before placing the order?
intent: Can you add the RGB headset to my cart and take me to the final checkout screen before placing the order?

program_html.locator: func:get_query_text(__page__, "#opc-sidebar > div.opc-block-summary > div > div.content.minicart-items > div > ol")

must_include: RAFIKI Gaming Headset with Microphone for PS4, PS5, Laptop, PC,Mobile Phone,7.1 Surround Sound Headphones,Memory Foam Ear Pads LED Lights, Self-Adjusting Over Ear Headset
